title: The roots of modern rage
itunes:title: The roots of modern rage
itunes:subtitle: Author and journalist Pankaj Mishra and historian Tom Holland discuss Mishra’s new book, Age of Anger, which explores the origins of the resentments that are fuelling radical politics around the world  See acast.com/privacy for privacy an...
description:
Author and journalist Pankaj Mishra and historian Tom Holland discuss Mishra’s new book, Age of Anger, which explores the origins of the resentments that are fuelling radical politics around the world

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
